name: Tower Escape (PoRoyal)
description:
2D Hyper casual game. Control the character's decent trought the tower, avoid all obstacles in your way, use your powerfoul cannon as your wish (it can also be used to propel yourself!)

Art/Code : Me

Music: szegvari (freesound)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse left click - Shoot

R - Reload

P - Pause
